text: Ntibifuriza u Rwanda n'Abanyarwanda ituze n'iterambere.
Ernest iyo ukimubona uba ubona ari umuntu wikunda nyamara siko biba bimeze ko ni umuntu witangira abandi kandi abantu akunda ashobora kubakorera buri kimwe gishoboka.
Mu Rwanda hari ibice byinshi bikurura ba mukerarugendo, aho ku isonga haza Pariki y'Igihugu y'Iburanga ibonekamo ingagi.
Yagize ati "Muri ibi bihe bikomeye natwe uyu ni umusanzu wacu w'isanamitima, duhumuriza abantu ko Imana itabataye.
Kimwe mu bintu dukwiriye guha agaciro, ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kuganira ku mutekano wo kuri murandasi.
Imodoka yacikishije Ubald na bagenzi be yamugejeje ku Kibuye [I Karongi], ibavanye i Gisenyi ku Nyundo, ubundi bakomeza n'amaguru bakora urugendo rw'iminsi itatu batarya, batanywa, bataryama.

text: Abategura aya marushanwa bavuze ko icyifuzo ari uko aya marushanwa yajya ategurwa nibura gatatu mu mwaka ubushobozi buramutse bubonetse.
Ni ishimwe rikomeye kuri twe kubona umuntu nk'uyu ukunda Imana kandi uzi n'ubwenge, bizadufasha mu iterambere."
Umunara wa Eiffel umwe mu miremire ku Isi, ufite metero 300 z'uburebure.
Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, abagore banganaga hafi na 70% by’abaturage bose.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye IGIHE, uyu mwanditsi yavuze ku gitabo cye ""Tous tes enfants dispersés"," bishatse kuvuga ""Abana bawe bose batatanye"" cyamuhesheje igihembo.
Hari impungenge ko ugukura kw'iyi mijyi kugenda gutwara ubutaka buhingwa kandi ari bwo bwakabaye buzakomeza gutanga umusaruro w'ibiribwa ku baturarwanda biyongera umunsi ku munsi.
Ati "Iyo utari hafi y'umuntu ngo mubonane bituma wumva ufite irungu ndetse ntimuhuze n'umwanya wo kuvugana cyane.
Yagize ati "Numvaga uko byagenda kose dufite ubuyobozi bwiza ndetse na RIB ishobora kumfasha uwo muntu yaba atarambuka umupaka agafatwa.
Ingabo n'ingore bibana ubuzima bwabyo bwose kuko bikora umuryango udacana inyuma (Monogamie).

text: Kuri we yakora ibibi byose bishoboka ariko akabaho.
Imiterere y'inzu ya mbere nini ku Isi igenewe guhingwamo.

Uyu mwana w'umuhungu ibi yarabikuranye igihe kiragera cyo kujya ku ishuri ababyeyi bakora inshingano zabo zo kumugezayo, ariko kubera ingaruka z'ubwo burwayi ntiyabashije gukurikira neza nk'abandi bana.
Eid al-Fitr, ni umunsi uba ari ikiruhuko ku bakozi bose mu Rwanda, inshuti n'abavandimwe bakajya kwishimana n'abayisilamu kuri uwo munsi mukuru.

text: Imanirafasha Samuel yasohoye amashusho y'indirimbo "Amariba" isubizamo abihebye ibyiringiro.

Abo Twagiramungu yifatanyije nabo harimo abashyiriweho impapuro mpuzamahanga zibata muri yombi, Rudatsimburwa avuga ko nta kabuza uyu musaza agomba gufatwa nk’umuterabwoba kuko kuba yifatanyije nabo bivuze ko yemera ibyo bakora.
Benshi mu bo mubana baba bategereje kureba ko bakubonaho za mbuto, iyo rero ntazo babonye ni ha handi wumva umuntu avuze ati "aho gukizwa nka kanaka nabireka."

Barasukiye mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda mu Murenge wa Gatsibo wo mu Karere ka Gatsibo, basanga Abazigaba barahakabye barema ingoma y’u Rweya rw’u Mubali, yari ikomatanyije Imirenge y’Akarere ka Gatsibo, n’imirenge imwe n’imwe iri mu Majyaruguru y’Akarere ka Kayonza.
